name: Defending Lydia Collier
description:
Defending Lydia Collier is the story of a London-based lawyer called in to defend the wife of one of the city's most influential and wealthy businessmen who has recently disappeared.



You'll play as Mr Oakwood, Lydia Collier's lawyer and be with the defendant during police interviews through to the trial in court, working to review the evidence and help build her case. Along the way, you'll meet various other characters and experience the life of a currently single wealthy London lawyer.

Whether your recently hired nineteen year old assistant, a local police officer, or the detective in charge of the case catches your eye, you'll be able to decide who you wish to interact with and choose to pursue romantically.

Your Choices Matter!


There are dozens of different choices and decisions that you can make which will lead you to different characters, different love interests and completely different playthroughs.

As the story develops you'll choose a faction to assist you and form your team, and begin an investigate into finding out exactly what happened to the billionaire Charles Collier.

Enormous amount of content!


Defending Lydia Collier has over 15,000 different images, several different animations and more than fifty different adults scenes!

This game contains swearing, nudity and adult scenes.
